lead_paragraph: Fourth-place Fiorentina and second-place Napoli both missed scoring opportunities and lost ground on the Serie A leader, Juventus.

headline.print_headline: Alonso Is Hero and Villain as Fiorentina Hold Napoli
headline.main: Fiorentina Holds Napoli to a Draw

snippet: Fourth-place Fiorentina and second-place Napoli both missed scoring opportunities and lost ground on the Serie A leader, Juventus....
